title: Rose Backroad X Classified gravel bike offers 1Ã—22-speed electronic drivetrain at lower cost
content:
Rose’s affordable carbon gravel bike gets that wild internally-geared rear hub 1x 22-speed electronic drivetrain in a new Backroad X Classified complete build. The German consumer-direct bike company is one of the first outside of Classified’s Belgian home base to integrate the alternative shifting system, and so far looks to be the lowest cost complete […]

The post Rose Backroad X Classified gravel bike offers 1×22-speed electronic drivetrain at lower cost appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
